1.0.0.en: Initial release with basic functionality to monitor and control the spa bath.

1.0.1.en: Updated device images to accurately showcase the actual devices compatible with the app.

1.0.2.en: Added capabilities for connection alerts to notify the user if the connection is lost, and freeze warnings to help avoid low temperature risks. And other minor changes.

1.0.3.en: The code was updated to enhance the "Connectivity Alarm" and "Freezing Alarm" for better accuracy. A new function was added to measure heating time, starting when the temperature range changes to high and stopping when the set temperature is reached.

1.0.4.en: Fixed an issue that caused the application to crash when the remote party (Balboa Spa) unexpectedly closed the socket. This fix provides a more stable and reliable connection.

1.0.5.en: App settings updated to include the ability to enable log to timeline
